mapper.select: SELECT MAX(DECODE(R.MOEL_CHECK, C.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER, C.DETAIL_CODE_NAME)) AS MOEL_CHECK , MAX(DECODE(R.MOEL_CHECK, C.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER, R.MOEL_CHECK)) AS MOEL_CHECK_CODE , MAX(DECODE(R.RETIREMENT_RANGE, C.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER, C.DETAIL_CODE_NAME)) AS RETIREMENT_RANGE , MAX(DECODE(R.RETIREMENT_RANGE, C.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER, R.RETIREMENT_RANGE)) AS RETIREMENT_RANGE_CODE , MAX(DECODE(R.MONTH_OR_DAY, C.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER, C.DETAIL_CODE_NAME)) AS MONTH_OR_DAY , MAX(DECODE(R.MONTH_OR_DAY, C.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER, R.MONTH_OR_DAY)) AS MONTH_OR_DAY_CODE , MAX(DECODE(R.RETIREDAY_CHECK, C.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER, C.DETAIL_CODE_NAME)) AS RETIREDAY_CHECK , MAX(DECODE(R.RETIREDAY_CHECK, C.DETAIL_CODE_NUMBER, R.RETIREDAY_CHECK)) AS RETIREDAY_CHECK_CODE FROM RETIREMENT_MANAGE R , DETAIL_CODE C
mapper.update: UPDATE RETIREMENT_MANAGE SET MOEL_CHECK=#{moelCheckCode}, RETIREMENT_RANGE=#{retirementRangeCode}, MONTH_OR_DAY=#{monthOrDayCode}, RETIREDAY_CHECK=#{retiredayCheckCode}
